CustomField.label: 02. RG Lapsed something we could improve

value.fullName: I have needed to direct my money elsewhere for a while.
value.label: a. I have needed to direct my money elsewhere for a while.

value.fullName: I would prefer to switch back from regular monthly donations to occasional donations.
value.label: b. I would prefer to switch back from regular monthly donations to occasional donations.

value.fullName: My bank account or credit card details have changed and I haven’t sent you updated details yet.
value.label: c. My bank account or credit card details have changed and I haven’t sent you updated details yet.

value.fullName: I have not found your stories motivating enough to compel me to donate.
value.label: d. I have not found your stories motivating enough to compel me to donate.

value.fullName: You have not provided enough information about how my donations make a difference.
value.label: e. You have not provided enough information about how my donations make a difference.
